attributes.action: create free elections in the uk
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: No election can be classified as truly free without the possibility of a no confidence vote or none of the above owing to the fact you do not have a free choice without this written in. i:e you are only given four dictators to choose from without this box.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
